entry.title: Jake Tapper: This is the danger of Trump's war on accountability

media:group.media:title: Jake Tapper: This is the danger of Trump's war on accountability
media:group.media:description: CNN's Jake Tapper says President Donald Trump is setting a dangerous precedent by removing oversight from government. #CNN #News #usnews #politics #presidentdonaldtrump #stateoftheunionwithjaketapper

media:group.media:description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria gives his take on the divide between employed elites and the laid-off working class people whose lives have been upended by the pandemic. #CNN #News #politics #usnews #fareedzakariagps #presidentdonaldtrump

media:group.media:description: CNN's Brian Stelter says President Donald Trump's cycle of anti-media attacks present challenges for members of the press. #CNN #News #isnews #politics #reliablesources #presidentdonaldtrump

media:group.media:title: A look into coronavirus case trends as states reopen
media:group.media:description: CNN's John King looks into several states' coronavirus case trend line as governors continue to reopen the economy. #CNN #News #usnews #politics #insidepolitics #presidentdonaldtrump

entry.title: Jake Tapper to Alex Azar: Why was the US hit harder by coronavirus?

media:group.media:title: Jake Tapper to Alex Azar: Why was the US hit harder by coronavirus?
media:group.media:description: CNN's Jake Tapper presses Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar about the high death toll in the US from Covid-19. #CNN #News #politics #usnews #presidentdonaldtrump #stateoftheunionwithjaketapper

entry.title: Top adviser warns China vulnerable to second wave

media:group.media:title: Top adviser warns China vulnerable to second wave
media:group.media:description: China still faces the "big challenge" of a potential second wave of Covid-19 infections, the country's top respiratory authority has warned, with the lack of immunity among the community a serious concern as the race to develop a vaccine continues. CNN's David Culver has the exclusive interview with Dr. Zhong Nanshan. #CNN #News #cnni #worldnews

entry.title: Hear Bill Clinton's remarks to the Class of 2020

media:group.media:title: Hear Bill Clinton's remarks to the Class of 2020
media:group.media:description:
Former President Bill Clinton delivers remarks during CNN's "Class of 2020: In This Together," a special tribute to graduates whose commencement ceremonies were canceled because of the coronavirus pandemic.
#CNN #News

media:group.media:title: The pandemic gets political
media:group.media:description: CNN's Michael Smerconish says that as the coronavirus continues to claim lives across the United States, partisanship and the pandemic are becoming increasingly intertwined. #CNN #News #usnews #politics #presidentdonaldtrump #smerconish

entry.title: How eating at McDonald's will be different because of Covid-19

media:group.media:title: How eating at McDonald's will be different because of Covid-19
media:group.media:description:
McDonald's sent franchise operators in the United States a detailed instruction manual outlining requirements for reopening dining rooms. CNN's Brian Todd looks at what will change for you.
#Covid-19 #CNN #News

entry.title: Protesters harass local reporter at reopening rally

media:group.media:title: Protesters harass local reporter at reopening rally
media:group.media:description:
News 12 Long Island reporter Kevin Vesey was covering a reopening when protesters harassed and insulted him, and some invaded his personal space while refusing to wear a mask. See more from Kevin at New 12 Long Island's YouTube channel https://bit.ly/2Lu73PP. or go to their website. http://longisland.news12.com/
#Covid-19 #CNN #News

entry.title: Donald Trump: 'Vaccine or no vaccine, we're back'

media:group.media:title: Donald Trump: 'Vaccine or no vaccine, we're back'
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump unveiled a crash effort aimed at developing a coronavirus vaccine by the end of the year but said the country would return to normal with or without one. "I just want to make something clear, it's very important. Vaccine or no vaccine, we're back" Trump said during a midday event in the Rose Garden. "And we're starting a process." The formal announcement of "Operation Warp Speed" came as researchers around the world scramble to develop a vaccine for the virus that has killed more than 300,000 people globally. CNN's Jim Acosta reports.
#Covid-19 #CNN #News

entry.title: Trump team makes bold coronavirus promise. See how health experts reacted

media:group.media:title: Trump team makes bold coronavirus promise. See how health experts reacted
media:group.media:description:
Moncef Slaoui, who is leading President Trump's vaccine effort, and Defense Secretary Mark Esper claimed there will be a coronavirus vaccine developed by the end of 2020. CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta and vaccine expert Dr. Peter Hotez give their reaction
#Coronavirus #CNN #News

entry.title: How cows could by key to combatting coronavirus

media:group.media:title: How cows could by key to combatting coronavirus
media:group.media:description: Scientists at SAb Biotherapeutics are planning to start studies this summer on coronavirus treatments created by using antibodies derived from cows with genetically engineered human immune systems. #CNN #News

entry.title: See iconic Las Vegas casino's unprecedented situation

media:group.media:title: See iconic Las Vegas casino's unprecedented situation
media:group.media:description: CNN's Kyung Lah speaks with the CEO of Caesars Entertainment Tony Rodio about how the pandemic has halted operations at the iconic Caesars Palace in Las Vegas, and how the hotel and casino plans to reopen once restrictions are eased. #CNN #News

entry.title: Greta Thunberg urges public to listen to the experts amid pandemic

media:group.media:title: Greta Thunberg urges public to listen to the experts amid pandemic
media:group.media:description: Climate activist Greta Thunberg says she thinks more people are beginning to realize the importance of listening to experts and the global science community amid the coronavirus pandemic. #CNN #News
